name: 1,000 Meters Deep
description:
Ahoy! You just won yourself a ship and a crew in Tortuga. Finally, you can reach the haunted depths no sailor has seen before -- those depths you've longed to see all your life.

That is... if you live to make it that far.

Please enjoy the game jam version of 1,000 Meters Deep. It's very much in its prototype stage, but we'll be back for some polish at a future date.

CREDITS:
